metadata.scope: AI and agentic automation potential for customer functions

professional_services.description: Standard implementations, checklists, and repeatable steps can be guided or executed by agents with human oversight.
Scheduling, capacity planning, and status updates are good candidates for automation.
Guided self-serve onboarding and training reduce live FTE need.

customer_success.description: Data-driven health and risk models with automated alerts and next-best-action suggestions.
Template-driven outreach, renewal reminders, and follow-ups can be drafted or triggered by agents.
RAG over playbooks and internal docs so CSMs get instant answers.

customer_support.description: Chatbots and deflective self-service for common, documentable issues.
customer_support.typical_scope_pct: 30–50% of tier-1 volume where knowledge is codified

customer_support.description: Intent classification and routing reduce handle time and improve consistency.
Real-time suggestions and article surfacing for agents.
